snippet: Blue Bell Creameries has resumed ice cream shipments four months after listeria contamination halted sales and production.
abstract: Blue Bell Creameries resumes shipments of its ice cream products four months after it halted production due to listeria outbreak; remains unclear when new products will be available for sale.
lead_paragraph: Blue Bell Creameries has resumed ice cream shipments four months after listeria contamination halted sales and production.

headline.main: Blue Bell Ice Cream Is Back on Sale After Listeria Stoppage
headline.print_headline: Blue Bell Ice Cream Is Back on Sale After Listeria Stoppage
